paper_abstract: Truncated distributions arise naturally in many industrial settings However, little has been published for computing quantities of interest of the truncated version even for the most popular normal distribution In this note, for the first time, we provide programs for computing the mean, variance, cumulative probability and two other quantities of interest for any truncated normal distribution whether it is left truncated, right truncated or doubly truncated The programs are written in R a freely downloadable statistical software (c) 2010 Wiley Periodicals Inc Comput Appl Eng Educ 18 589-592, 2010, View this article on at wileyonlinelibrary com, DOI 10 1002/cae 20212
paper_title: Programs in R for Computing, Truncated Normal Distributions
